title: VR-Based Mathematics Learning Environment Design: Applying the Teacher-Designer Model

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Mathematics Curriculum Knowledge and Basic Digital Tool Proficiency
context.additional_context: Scenario design using VR-PEAS editing tools and integrated LMS (Learning Management System) operations

learning_goals: Learners can design scenarios for teaching elementary mathematics concepts (e.g., geometry, measurement) in a VR environment.
Learners can structure VR learning activities (goals, interactions, assessments) according to the teacher-as-designer model.
Learners can create reusable educational scenarios using VR-PEAS tools integrated with the LMS.

resources: Basic VR Development Kit (e.g., Unity3D Educational Edition)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
